{"id":489620729,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 year, 1 month","timestamp":1620305796,"status_display":"Runtime Error","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/489620729/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Non-decreasing Array","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool checkPossibility(vector<int>& nums) {\n        int cnt=0,tmp=-1;\n        int m=nums.size();\n        for(int i=1;i<m;i++){\n            if(nums[i]<nums[i-1]){\n                cnt++;\n                tmp=i;\n            }\n        }\n        //cout<<tmp<<endl;\n        if(cnt>=2) return false;\n        if(tmp==m-1){\n            return true;\n        }\n        else{\n            if(nums[tmp-1]>nums[tmp+1]){\n                nums[tmp-1]=nums[tmp]-1;\n            }\n            else{\n                nums[tmp]=(nums[tmp-1]+nums[tmp+1])/2;\n            }\n            cnt=0;\n            for(int i=1;i<m;i++){\n                if(nums[i]<nums[i-1]){\n                    cnt++;\n                    tmp=i;\n                }\n            }\n            if(cnt==1) return false;\n            return true;\n        }\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"non-decreasing-array"}
